item.description:
5 minute blue thoughts

I like Ice Nova

but I the rest of it has issues

  • basic
  • weak

FA doesnt make bleed immune
IB is a copy of reaper’s abil
neither attacks bypass anything

sorc wins by absurd kp, trying to end the game earlier then the rest
reaper wins by absurd vote manip and attacks are able to bypass everything(with gather darkness)
poss wins by being hard to track down/mechanically catch

this doesnt really have a spot as it cant get around healers, investigatives, bleeds.

I think Ice Nova could get repurposed into a different fro zone class but as it stands alot of it is kinda eh

id say its somewhat crucial to make FA stop bleeds, Ice Nova bypass healing and Ice Spear has something to it but Im not looking to take control of all creativity
